TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Bakir_Izetbegović, title = Bakir_Izetbegović, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bakir_Izetbegović} }

S.FORM: = Bakir Izetbegović = Mntucing hngkawas 1956 idas 6 jiyax 28 ka Bakir Izetbegović ga, empklaw ka hiya. Bukung klwaan Bosnia and herzegovina ta sayang o kiya ka Bakir Izetbegović, pnaah hngkawas 2016 idas 3 jiyax 17 pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. = Bakir Izetbegović = Bakir Izetbegović (kari Bosna: Bakir Izetbegović; kngkawas 1956 idas 6 diyax 28), pa taxa Bosna Mi Hercegovina na Seyji Jnwi, laqi brah Bosna Mi Hercegovina Cusitwan Aria Icetpeykwici. Kngkawas 2010 prading ngalan Bosna Mi Hercegovina Cusitwan Dayhyo ntumal niya, saya ka Mincu Singtong Tang Tangcusi. Kndusan mi kyoiku cuxan Bakir Izetbegović mntuting Sarajevo, kiya mi mniq Sarajevo, muyas pyasan tutiping mi pyasan tubaraw, kngkawas 1981 u mnhdu muyas Pyasan Tubeyhing Sarajevo Cyeyncu Sweyweyn. Kngkawas 1982 dhuq kngkawas 1992, Bakir Izetbegović mniq 1 cyeyncu csyun kongs ngalan komung. Kndusan seyji niya cuxan Bakir Izetbegović kngkawas 1991 dhuq kngkawas 2003 ngalan Sarajevo Canton Cyeyncu Sweyweyn Yingcyo. Bakir Izetbegović mniq kngkawas 2006 seyngkyo mangal Bosnia mi Herzegovina Gikay giying. Kiya mi kngkawas 2002 prading ngalan SDA dcusitwan. Kngkawas 2015 idas 5, Bakir Izetbegović pa spuda seyngkyo mangal Mincu Singtong Tang Cusi, rmirih Sulejman Tihić. Soto(2010–2018) Mniq kcka kngkawas 2010 seyngkyo cida, Bakir Izetbegović ka sediq Bosnia u, wada mbiyax mangal Soto Bosnia Mi Herzegovina. Waycyaw cngce Kngkawas 2012 idas 6, Bakir Izetbegović smriq kari Soto Serbian Tomislav Nikolić ini sruwa Srebrenica Beyhing Pnhqilan ka uuda pkngatun minjoku, niyi u wisu tmseyyax mtngari mudus niya. Kngkawas 2012 idas 10, Bakir Izetbegović tuhuy kana mnniq qmpah Sotohu niya msupu mniq Sarajevo mtqita dqras Amirika Kwowucing Hillary Clinton. Kngkawas 2014 idas 7, Bakir Izetbegović pkla kari Gaza ka "Qnbsyaqn balay ida kiya pusu bbun niya Israeli", kiya mi mdhu kari rmngawqnlangan u wisu "Luxay yahan pqrqilan Israeli". Pnluban niya Turkey Kngkawas 2016, alaw kari mi hnang Turkey, seyhu Turkey u smruwa dmuwi kari Bosnian ka ngalan dha duma sapah pyasan na slhayan sweynsyoke, kiya u pkla kari mpniq kngkawas 2018 prading smluhay. Kngkawas 2018 idas 5, mniq brah mkpiya diyax cida ka Soto Turkey Recep Tayyip Erdoğan homung Bosnia Mi Herzegovina cida, Izetbegović pa rmngaw: "Erdoğan kamptusa niya Muslim, kiya ka niyi ka Tuiwil pusu bay ini skuxun hiya." Seuhu Turkey pa dmayaw phiyu ndanan cida wada sliqn ka nniqan bay rikisi na Sapah Thmkuwan Cingcns kiya ka Mccbu Pohey, mray so Cingcns Aladža mi Cingcns Arnaudija. Malix qpahun Soto daw (kngkawas 2018 dhuq saya) ) Bakir Izetbegović pa dhuq ka diyax mnhdu qpahun niya Soto daw kasi ka qulung mlatac qpahun Soto, ini qbsiyaq daw, alaw 8 knkawas ka diyax iyax qpahun Soto, kngkawas 2019 idas 2 diyax 25 cida, Bakir Izetbegović u wada ngalan Bosnian Mi Herzegovina kcka Jnmin Weyn uri da. Pprngawan Tunarac Hunac Oco u seymung bay mpsbuc Sntali Cuyi Mi Niqan Pnsliyan Cumi ka Dževad Galijašević u mniq kngkawas 2011 hmili tmiyu Bakir Izetbegović pa dhuq ka diyax mnhdu qpahun niya Soto daw kasi ka qulung mlatac qpahun Soto, ini qbsiyaq daw, alaw 8 knkawas ka diyax iyax qpahun Soto, kngkawas 2019 idas 2 diyax 25 cida, Bakir Izetbegović u wada ngalan Bosnian Mi Herzegovina kcka Jnmin Weyn uri da. Dmkuh mi dmayaw Bosnian Mi Herzegovina na Wahabi Pay. Kngkawas 2019 idas 10, ana so knhbrawan hiyi sediq qnlangan ka mdakar msang quri uuda niyi, bninaw Bakir Izetbegović u dmkuh Turkey mquri tunarac daya Syria mcbu, kiya mi rmangaw kari "Turkey u niqan biyax qmlahang anjeyng dah mi mndungus dxral mi uuda psbalay sediq qnlqilan". Kngkawas 2020 idas 5 cida, Bakir Izetbegović pa wada hliyan tmiyu hiya ka "Bosnian Mi Herzegovina wisu dmudul Waya Islamkyo", so niyi u pndungus bay pnsltudan Islam na 1 Waya Snlhayan. Kndusan niya nanaq Bakir Izetbegović u mniq kngkawas 1983 tuhuy Sebija Građević msturung, dhiya u niqan 1 laqi qridin Jasmina, wa mniq Sarajevo. Qridin niya ka "KCUS"- Klinički Centar Univerziteta Sarajevo (kari Ingkoku: University of Sarajevo Clinical Center) na Cangwu Tongs. Kngkawas 2020 idas 10 diyax 16, Bakir Izetbegović pa snquri COVID-19 keyngsa uptura balay runan Narux Brah Uhan, kiya mi mniq kngkawas 2021 idas 5 diyax 26 cida muda pbeytaq tu1 qumi Hweyjwey-BioNTech yimyaw.

= Bakir Izetbegović = Mntocing hngkawas 1956 idas 6 jiyax 28 ka Bakir Izetbegović ga, empklaw ka hiya. Bokong klwaan Bosnia and herzegovina ta sayang o kiya ka Bakir Izetbegović, pnaah hngkawas 2016 idas 3 jiyax 17 pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. = Bakir Izetbegović = Bakir Izetbegović (kari Bosna: Bakir Izetbegović; kngkawas 1956 idas 6 diyax 28), pa taxa Bosna Mi Hercegovina na Seyji Jnwi, laqi brah Bosna Mi Hercegovina Cositwan Aria Icetpeykwici. Kngkawas 2010 prading ngalan Bosna Mi Hercegovina Cositwan Dayhyo ntomal niya, saya ka Minco Singtong Tang Tangcosi. Kndosan mi kyoiko coxan Bakir Izetbegović mntoting Sarajevo, kiya mi mniq Sarajevo, moyas pyasan totiping mi pyasan tobaraw, kngkawas 1981 o mnhdo moyas Pyasan Tobeyhing Sarajevo Cyeynco Sweyweyn. Kngkawas 1982 dhoq kngkawas 1992, Bakir Izetbegović mniq 1 cyeynco csyon kongs ngalan komong. Kndosan seyji niya coxan Bakir Izetbegović kngkawas 1991 dhoq kngkawas 2003 ngalan Sarajevo Canton Cyeynco Sweyweyn Yingcyo. Bakir Izetbegović mniq kngkawas 2006 seyngkyo mangal Bosnia mi Herzegovina Gikay giying. Kiya mi kngkawas 2002 prading ngalan SDA dcositwan. Kngkawas 2015 idas 5, Bakir Izetbegović pa spoda seyngkyo mangal Minco Singtong Tang Cosi, rmirih Solejman Tihić. Soto(2010–2018) Mniq kcka kngkawas 2010 seyngkyo cida, Bakir Izetbegović ka sediq Bosnia o, wada mbiyax mangal Soto Bosnia Mi Herzegovina. Waycyaw cngce Kngkawas 2012 idas 6, Bakir Izetbegović smriq kari Soto Serbian Tomislav Nikolić ini srowa Srebrenica Beyhing Pnhqilan ka ooda pkngaton minjoko, niyi o wiso tmseyyax mtngari modos niya. Kngkawas 2012 idas 10, Bakir Izetbegović tohoy kana mnniq qmpah Sotoho niya msopo mniq Sarajevo mtqita dqras Amirika Kwowocing Hillary Clinton. Kngkawas 2014 idas 7, Bakir Izetbegović pkla kari Gaza ka "Qnbsyaqn balay ida kiya poso bbon niya Israeli", kiya mi mdho kari rmngawqnlangan o wiso "Loxay yahan pqrqilan Israeli". Pnloban niya Torkey Kngkawas 2016, alaw kari mi hnang Torkey, seyho Torkey o smrowa dmowi kari Bosnian ka ngalan dha doma sapah pyasan na slhayan sweynsyoke, kiya o pkla kari mpniq kngkawas 2018 prading smlohay. Kngkawas 2018 idas 5, mniq brah mkpiya diyax cida ka Soto Torkey Recep Tayyip Erdoğan homong Bosnia Mi Herzegovina cida, Izetbegović pa rmngaw: "Erdoğan kamptosa niya Moslim, kiya ka niyi ka Toiwil poso bay ini skoxon hiya." Seoho Torkey pa dmayaw phiyo ndanan cida wada sliqn ka nniqan bay rikisi na Sapah Thmkowan Cingcns kiya ka Mccbo Pohey, mray so Cingcns Aladža mi Cingcns Arnaodija. Malix qpahon Soto daw (kngkawas 2018 dhoq saya) ) Bakir Izetbegović pa dhoq ka diyax mnhdo qpahon niya Soto daw kasi ka qolong mlatac qpahon Soto, ini qbsiyaq daw, alaw 8 knkawas ka diyax iyax qpahon Soto, kngkawas 2019 idas 2 diyax 25 cida, Bakir Izetbegović o wada ngalan Bosnian Mi Herzegovina kcka Jnmin Weyn ori da. Pprngawan Tonarac Honac Oco o seymong bay mpsboc Sntali Coyi Mi Niqan Pnsliyan Comi ka Dževad Galijašević o mniq kngkawas 2011 hmili tmiyo Bakir Izetbegović pa dhoq ka diyax mnhdo qpahon niya Soto daw kasi ka qolong mlatac qpahon Soto, ini qbsiyaq daw, alaw 8 knkawas ka diyax iyax qpahon Soto, kngkawas 2019 idas 2 diyax 25 cida, Bakir Izetbegović o wada ngalan Bosnian Mi Herzegovina kcka Jnmin Weyn ori da. Dmkoh mi dmayaw Bosnian Mi Herzegovina na Wahabi Pay. Kngkawas 2019 idas 10, ana so knhbrawan hiyi sediq qnlangan ka mdakar msang qori ooda niyi, bninaw Bakir Izetbegović o dmkoh Torkey mqori tonarac daya Syria mcbo, kiya mi rmangaw kari "Torkey o niqan biyax qmlahang anjeyng dah mi mndongos dxral mi ooda psbalay sediq qnlqilan". Kngkawas 2020 idas 5 cida, Bakir Izetbegović pa wada hliyan tmiyo hiya ka "Bosnian Mi Herzegovina wiso dmodol Waya Islamkyo", so niyi o pndongos bay pnsltodan Islam na 1 Waya Snlhayan. Kndosan niya nanaq Bakir Izetbegović o mniq kngkawas 1983 tohoy Sebija Građević mstorong, dhiya o niqan 1 laqi qridin Jasmina, wa mniq Sarajevo. Qridin niya ka "KCUS"- Klinički Centar Univerziteta Sarajevo (kari Ingkoko: University of Sarajevo Clinical Center) na Cangwo Tongs. Kngkawas 2020 idas 10 diyax 16, Bakir Izetbegović pa snqori COVID-19 keyngsa optora balay ronan Narox Brah Uhan, kiya mi mniq kngkawas 2021 idas 5 diyax 26 cida moda pbeytaq to1 qomi Hweyjwey-BioNTech yimyaw.
